thread.title: Shamokin Area students become environmental education leaders through EELS program | School News | newsitem.com
thread.title_full: Shamokin Area students become environmental education leaders through EELS program | School News | newsitem.com

author: Mackenzie Witt
title: Shamokin Area students become environmental education leaders through EELS program | School News | newsitem.com
text:
COAL TOWNSHIP — A group of Shamokin Area High School students is making waves in local environmental education, thanks to their participation in the Environmental Education Leadership for Students (EELS) program at Susquehanna University’s field station.
Twenty students from Shamokin Area participated in a full-day training at Susquehanna University’s field station, where they engaged in interactive modules focused on environmental storytelling, planning for diverse audiences and integrating technology into environmental education.
